 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכָּבִישׁ‎</span> **noun masculine** ==spider== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכּוּבִיתָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכָּבִיתָא‎</span>; whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכְשׁוּב‎</span> probably ***tarantula***, according to [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iii.648</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית ע‎</span> [[Job.8.14|Job 8:14]] i.e. web, so probably [[Job.27.18|Job 27:18]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשׁ‎</span>); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּרֵי ע‎</span> [[Isa.59.5|Isa 59:5]] ***filaments of a spider***.
